db:abstract.db:para: A simple chat between a server and a remote client running in a browser.

db:article.db:programlisting:
QT += gui webchannel widgets websockets
CONFIG += warn_on
SOURCES += \ main.cpp \ ../shared/websockettransport.cpp \ ../shared/websocketclientwrapper.cpp
HEADERS += \ ../shared/websockettransport.h \ ../shared/websocketclientwrapper.h
FORMS += \ dialog.ui
DEFINES += "BUILD_DIR=\"\\\""$$OUT_PWD"\\\"\""
exampleassets.files += \ index.html exampleassets.path = $$[QT_INSTALL_EXAMPLES]/webchannel/standalone include(../exampleassets.pri)
target.path = $$[QT_INSTALL_EXAMPLES]/webchannel/standalone INSTALLS += target
